name: Dumbbell Flyes
setup: Lie flat on bench with feet planted on floor
Hold dumbbells with neutral grip above chest
steps: Inhale and slowly lower weights in wide arc
Keep slight bend in elbows throughout
Lower until you feel stretch in chest
Exhale and bring weights back up in same arc
cues: Feel stretch in chest, not shoulders
mistakes: Going too heavy and losing form
Lowering too far and stressing shoulders
Using momentum instead of muscle control
safety: Start light to learn the movement. Stop if you feel strain in shoulders or front delts.

prescriptionHints.notes: Focus on chest stretch and contraction

joints.notes: Keep movement controlled and avoid excessive stretch. Listen to shoulders.
